pkgmetadata.longdescription: eval-hj3415==========eval-hj3415 evaluate naver financial data.Quick start------------from eval_hj3415 import evalfor all eval dictionary.. eval.Eval(<<code:str>>).get_all()or.. eval.Score(<<code:str>>).eval_dictfor get score.. s = eval.Score(<<code:str>>) s.red() s.mil() s.blue()
